p: A recent review [ 17] published the viraemic prevalence in 17 countries (Bahrain, Bulgaria, Cameroon, Colombia, Croatia, Dominican Republic, Ethiopia, Ghana, Hong Kong, Jordan, Kazakhstan, Malaysia, Morocco, Nigeria, Oman, Qatar, Taiwan). In this study, the viraemic prevalence varied between 0.2% in Hong Kong and 2.4% in Taiwan, while the largest viraemic populations were in Nigeria (2,597,000 cases) and Taiwan (569,000 cases).
